ruleArticles:
<js>
json=[];
if(baseUrl.match(/★/)){
list=baseUrl.replace(/http.*?wd=\s*/,'').split('★');
for(i in list){
href=list[i].match(/【(.*?)】/)[1];
text=list[i].match(/《(.*?)》/)[1];
intro=list[i].match(/◎(.*?)◎/)[1];
index=list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)?list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)[1]:list[i].match(/^(.*?)【/)[1]
json.push({text:text,src:href,intro:intro,index:index})
}
}
JSON.stringify(json)</js>
$.[*]

html = result //总页数-1(最后一页没有图 page = parseInt(java.getString('class.pager@tag.li.-3@tag.a@text')) java.log("共"+page+"页") if(page>1){ nurl=[]; base=baseUrl.replace('.aspx','p'); for(i=2;i<=page;i++){ nurl.push(base+i+".aspx,{'retry':16}") } res=java.ajaxAll(nurl) for(i in res){ html += org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(res[i].body()) } } id.content@tag.img@src##\n##, li='\n' list=result.split(',') for(i in list){ li += '
    • \n' }
      {{result}}
    {{@@tag.script.-3@html##$(function(){wqcms.imgCont=$i('content');wqcms.imgResize();InitContStyle();wqcms.dispVars();});}}
